attacks.name: Thunder Throw
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Repeat Lightning
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.
